2553{
2554 map &here = get_map();
2555 // Can't use item_stack::only_item() since there might be fertilizer
2556 map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
2557 const map_stack::iterator seed = std::find_if( items.begin(), items.end(), []( const item & it ) {
2558 return it.is_seed();
2559 } );
2560
2561 if( seed == items.end() ) {
2562 debugmsg( "Missing seed for plant at (%d, %d, %d)", examp.x, examp.y, examp.z );
2563 here.i_clear( examp );
2564 here.furn_set( examp, f_null );
2565 return;
2566 }
2567
2568 const std::string pname = seed->get_plant_name();
2569
2570 if( here.has_flag_furn( flag_GROWTH_HARVEST, examp ) &&
2571 query_yn( _( "Harvest the %s?" ), pname ) ) {
2572 harvest_plant( p, examp );
2573 } else if( !here.has_flag_furn( flag_GROWTH_HARVEST, examp ) ) {
2574 if( here.i_at( examp ).size() > 1 ) {
2575 add_msg( m_info, _( "This %s has already been fertilized." ), pname );
2576 return;
2577 }
2578 itype_id fertilizer = choose_fertilizer( p, pname, true /*ask player for confirmation */ );
2579
2580 if( !fertilizer.is_empty() ) {
2581 fertilize_plant( p, examp, fertilizer );
2582 }
2583 }
2584}

void iexamine::arcfurnace_empty ( player &  p,

)
Fabrication decreases loss when firing a furnace

Definition at line 2719 of file iexamine.cpp.

2720{
2721 map &here = get_map();
2722 furn_id cur_arcfurnace_type = here.furn( examp );
2723 furn_id next_arcfurnace_type = f_null;
2724 if( cur_arcfurnace_type == f_arcfurnace_empty ) {
2725 next_arcfurnace_type = f_arcfurnace_full;
2726 } else {
2727 debugmsg( "Examined furniture has action arcfurnace_empty, but is of type %s",
2728 here.furn( examp ).id().c_str() );
2729 return;
2730 }
2731
2732 static const std::set<material_id> arcfurnaceable{ material_id( "cac2powder" ) };
2733 bool fuel_present = false;
2734 auto items = here.i_at( examp );
2735 for( const item &i : items ) {
2736 if( i.typeId() == itype_chem_carbide ) {
2737 add_msg( _( "This furnace already contains calcium carbide." ) );
2738 add_msg( _( "Remove it before activating the arc furnace again." ) );
2739 return;
2740 } else if( i.made_of_any( arcfurnaceable ) ) {
2741 fuel_present = true;
2742 } else {
2743 add_msg( m_bad, _( "This furnace contains %s, which can't be made into calcium carbide!" ),
2744 i.tname( 1, false ) );
2745 return;
2746 }
2747 }
2748
2749 if( !fuel_present ) {
2750 add_msg( _( "This furance is empty. Fill it with powdered coke and lime mix, and try again." ) );
2751 return;
2752 }
2753
2754 ///\EFFECT_FABRICATION decreases loss when firing a furnace
2755 const int skill = p.get_skill_level( skill_fabrication );
2756 int loss = 60 - 2 *
2757 skill; // Inefficency is still fine, coal and limestone is abundant
2758
2759 // Burn stuff that should get charred, leave out the rest
2760 units::volume total_volume = 0_ml;
2761 for( const item &i : items ) {
2762 total_volume += i.volume();
2763 }
2764
2765 units::volume char_volume = ( 100 - loss ) * total_volume / 100;
2766 int char_charges = itype_unfinished_cac2->charges_per_volume( char_volume );
2767 if( char_charges < 1 ) {
2768 add_msg( _( "The batch in this furance is too small to yield usable calcium carbide." ) );
2769 return;
2770 }
2771 //arc furnaces require a huge amount of current, so 1 full storage battery would work as a stand in
2772 if( !p.has_charges( itype_UPS, 1250 ) ) {
2773 add_msg( _( "This furnace is ready to be turned on, but you lack a UPS with sufficient power." ) );
2774 return;
2775 } else {
2776 add_msg( _( "This furnace contains %s %s of material, and is ready to be turned on." ),
2777 format_volume( total_volume ), volume_units_abbr() );
2778 if( !query_yn( _( "Turn on the furnace?" ) ) ) {
2779 return;
2780 }
2781 }
2782
2783 p.use_charges( itype_UPS, 1250 );
2784 here.i_clear( examp );
2785 here.furn_set( examp, next_arcfurnace_type );
2786 item result( itype_unfinished_cac2, calendar::turn );
2787 result.charges = char_charges;
2788 here.add_item( examp, result );
2789 add_msg( _( "You turn on the furnace." ) );
2790}

void iexamine::arcfurnace_full ( player &  p,
const tripoint &  examp

Definition at line 2792 of file iexamine.cpp.

2793{
2794 map &here = get_map();
2795 furn_id cur_arcfurnace_type = here.furn( examp );
2796 furn_id next_arcfurnace_type = f_null;
2797 if( cur_arcfurnace_type == f_arcfurnace_full ) {
2798 next_arcfurnace_type = f_arcfurnace_empty;
2799 } else {
2800 debugmsg( "Examined furniture has action arcfurnace_full, but is of type %s",
2801 here.furn( examp ).id().c_str() );
2802 return;
2803 }
2804
2805 map_stack items = here.i_at( examp );
2806 if( items.empty() ) {
2807 add_msg( _( "This furnace is empty" ) );
2808 here.furn_set( examp, next_arcfurnace_type );
2809 return;
2810 }
2811 add_msg( _( "There's an arc furnace there." ) );
2812 const time_duration firing_time = 2_hours; // Arc furnaces work really fast in reality
2813 const time_duration time_left = firing_time - items.only_item().age();
2814 if( time_left > 0_turns ) {
2815 int hours = to_hours<int>( time_left );
2816 int minutes = to_minutes<int>( time_left ) + 1;
2817 if( minutes > 60 ) {
2818 add_msg( vgettext( "It will finish burning in about %d hour.",
2819 "It will finish burning in about %d hours.",
2820 hours ), hours );
2821 } else if( minutes > 30 ) {
2822 add_msg( _( "It will finish burning in less than an hour." ) );
2823 } else {
2824 add_msg( _( "It should take about %d minutes to finish burning." ), minutes );
2825 }
2826 return;
2827 }
2828
2829 units::volume total_volume = 0_ml;
2830 // Burn stuff that should get charred, leave out the rest
2831 for( auto item_it = items.begin(); item_it != items.end(); ) {
2832 if( item_it->typeId() == itype_unfinished_cac2 || item_it->typeId() == itype_chem_carbide ) {
2833 total_volume += item_it->volume();
2834 item_it = items.erase( item_it );
2835 } else {
2836 item_it++;
2837 }
2838 }
2839
2840 item result( itype_chem_carbide, calendar::turn );
2841 result.charges = itype_chem_carbide->charges_per_volume( total_volume );
2842 here.add_item( examp, result );
2843 here.furn_set( examp, next_arcfurnace_type );
2844 add_msg( _( "It has finished burning, yielding %d calcium carbide." ), result.charges );
2845}

5279 }

void iexamine::bars ( player &  p,
const tripoint &  examp 
)

If player has amorphous trait, slip through the bars.

Definition at line 1213 of file iexamine.cpp.

1214{
1215 if( !( p.has_trait( trait_AMORPHOUS ) ) ) {
1216 none( p, examp );
1217 return;
1218 }
1219 map &here = get_map();
1220 if( ( ( p.encumb( bp_torso ) ) >= 10 ) && ( ( p.encumb( bp_head ) ) >= 10 ) &&
1221 ( p.encumb( bp_foot_l ) >= 10 ||
1222 p.encumb( bp_foot_r ) >= 10 ) ) { // Most likely places for rigid gear that would catch on the bars.
1223 add_msg( m_info,
1224 _( "Your amorphous body could slip though the %s, but your cumbersome gear can't." ),
1225 here.tername( examp ) );
1226 return;
1227 }
1228 if( !query_yn( _( "Slip through the %s?" ), here.tername( examp ) ) ) {
1229 none( p, examp );
1230 return;
1231 }
1232 p.moves -= to_turns<int>( 2_seconds );
1233 add_msg( _( "You slide right between the bars." ) );
1234 p.setpos( examp );
1235}

◆ cardreader()

void iexamine::cardreader ( player &  p,
const tripoint &  examp 
)

Use id/hack reader.

Using an id despawns turrets.

Definition at line 1021 of file iexamine.cpp.

1022{
1023 bool open = false;
1024 map &here = get_map();
1025 itype_id card_type = ( here.ter( examp ) == t_card_science ? itype_id_science :
1026 here.ter( examp ) == t_card_military ? itype_id_military :
1027 itype_id_industrial );
1028 if( p.has_amount( card_type, 1 ) && query_yn( _( "Swipe your ID card?" ) ) ) {
1029 p.mod_moves( -to_turns<int>( 1_seconds ) );
1030 for( const tripoint &tmp : here.points_in_radius( examp, 3 ) ) {
1031 if( here.ter( tmp ) == t_door_metal_locked ) {
1032 here.ter_set( tmp, t_door_metal_c );
1033 open = true;
1034 }
1035 }
1036 for( monster &critter : g->all_monsters() ) {
1037 // Check 1) same overmap coords, 2) turret, 3) hostile
1038 if( ms_to_omt_copy( here.getabs( critter.pos() ) ) == ms_to_omt_copy( here.getabs( examp ) ) &&
1039 critter.has_flag( MF_ID_CARD_DESPAWN ) &&
1040 critter.attitude_to( p ) == Creature::Attitude::A_HOSTILE ) {
1041 g->remove_zombie( critter );
1042 }
1043 }
1044 if( open ) {
1045 add_msg( _( "You insert your ID card." ) );
1046 add_msg( m_good, _( "The nearby doors unlock." ) );
1047 p.use_amount( card_type, 1 );
1048 } else {
1049 add_msg( _( "The nearby doors are already opened." ) );
1050 }
1051 } else if( query_yn( _( "Attempt to hack this card-reader?" ) ) ) {
1052 try_start_hacking( p, examp );
1053 }
1054}

1071{
1072 bool open = false;
1073 if( ( p.is_wearing( itype_id( "foodperson_mask" ) ) ||
1074 p.is_wearing( itype_id( "foodperson_mask_on" ) ) ) &&
1075 query_yn( _( "Press mask on the reader?" ) ) ) {
1076 p.mod_moves( -100 );
1077 map &here = get_map();

1079 if( here.ter( tmp ) == t_door_metal_locked ) {
1080 here.ter_set( tmp, t_door_metal_c );
1081 open = true;
1082 }
1083 }
1084 if( open ) {
1085 add_msg( _( "You press your face on the reader." ) );
1086 add_msg( m_good, _( "The nearby doors are unlocked." ) );

1088 _( "\"Hello Foodperson. Welcome home.\"" ), true, "speech", "welcome" );
1089 } else {
1090 add_msg( _( "The nearby doors are already unlocked." ) );

1092 for( const tripoint &tmp : here.points_in_radius( examp, 3 ) ) {
1093 if( here.ter( tmp ) == t_door_metal_o || here.ter( tmp ) == t_door_metal_c ) {
1094 if( p.pos() == tmp ) {
1095 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You are in the way of the door, move before trying again." ) );
1096 } else {
1097 here.ter_set( tmp, t_door_metal_locked );
1098 }
1099 }
1100 }
1101 }
1102 }
1103 } else if( p.has_amount( itype_id( "foodperson_mask" ), 1 ) ||
1104 p.has_amount( itype_id( "foodperson_mask_on" ), 1 ) ) {
1105 sounds::sound( examp, 6, sounds::sound_t::electronic_speech,
1106 _( "\"FOODPERSON DETECTED. Please make yourself presentable.\"" ), true,
1107 "speech", "welcome" );

void iexamine::chainfence ( player &  p,

)

Prompt climbing over fence.

Calculates move cost, applies it to player and, moves them.

Dexterity decreases chances of slipping while climbing

Definition at line 1158 of file iexamine.cpp.

1159{
1160 // We're not going to do anything if we're already on that point.
1161 // Also prompt the player before taking an action.
1162 if( p.pos() == examp || !query_yn( _( "Climb obstacle?" ) ) ) {
1163 none( p, examp );
1164 return;
1165 }
1166
1167 map &here = get_map();
1168 if( here.has_flag( flag_CLIMB_SIMPLE, examp ) && p.has_trait( trait_PARKOUR ) ) {
1169 add_msg( _( "You vault over the obstacle with ease." ) );
1170 p.moves -= 100; // Not tall enough to warrant spider-climbing, so only relevant trait.
1171 } else if( here.has_flag( flag_CLIMB_SIMPLE, examp ) ) {
1172 add_msg( _( "You vault over the obstacle." ) );
1173 p.moves -= 300; // Most common move cost for barricades pre-change.
1174 } else if( p.has_trait( trait_ARACHNID_ARMS_OK ) &&
1175 !p.wearing_something_on( bodypart_id( "torso" ) ) ) {
1176 add_msg( _( "Climbing this obstacle is trivial for one such as you." ) );
1177 p.moves -= 75; // Yes, faster than walking. 6-8 limbs are impressive.
1178 } else if( p.has_trait( trait_INSECT_ARMS_OK ) &&
1179 !p.wearing_something_on( bodypart_id( "torso" ) ) ) {
1180 add_msg( _( "You quickly scale the fence." ) );
1181 p.moves -= 90;
1182 } else if( p.has_trait( trait_PARKOUR ) ) {
1183 add_msg( _( "This obstacle is no match for your freerunning abilities." ) );
1184 p.moves -= 100;
1185 } else {
1186 p.moves -= 400;

1190 climb = climb / 2;
1191 }
1192 if( g->slip_down() ) {

Definition at line 260 of file iexamine.cpp.

261{
262 // Select an item to which it is possible to apply a diamond coating
263 auto loc = g->inv_map_splice( []( const item & e ) {
264 return ( e.is_melee( DT_CUT ) || e.is_melee( DT_STAB ) ) && e.made_of( material_id( "steel" ) ) &&
265 !e.has_flag( flag_DIAMOND ) && !e.has_flag( flag_NO_CVD );
266 }, _( "Apply diamond coating" ), 1, _( "You don't have a suitable item to coat with diamond" ) );
267
268 if( !loc ) {
269 return;
270 }
271
272 // Require materials proportional to selected item volume
273 auto qty = loc->volume() / units::legacy_volume_factor;
274 qty = std::max( 1, qty );
275 auto reqs = *requirement_id( "cvd_diamond" ) * qty;
276
277 if( !reqs.can_make_with_inventory( p.crafting_inventory(), is_crafting_component ) ) {
278 popup( "%s", reqs.list_missing() );
279 return;
280 }
281
282 // Consume materials
283 for( const auto &e : reqs.get_components() ) {
284 p.consume_items( e, 1, is_crafting_component );
285 }
286 for( const auto &e : reqs.get_tools() ) {
287 p.consume_tools( e );
288 }
289 p.invalidate_crafting_inventory();
290
291 // Apply flag to item
292 loc->set_flag( "DIAMOND" );
293 add_msg( m_good, _( "You apply a diamond coating to your %s" ), loc->type_name() );
294 p.mod_moves( -to_turns<int>( 10_seconds ) );
295}

2312 std::vector<item *> seed_inv = p.items_with( []( const item & itm ) {
2313 return itm.is_seed();
2314 } );
2315 if( seed_inv.empty() ) {
2316 add_msg( m_info, _( "You have no seeds to plant." ) );
2317 return;
2318 }
2319 if( !here.i_at( examp ).empty() ) {
2320 add_msg( _( "Something's lying there" ) );
2321 return;
2322 }
2323
2324 auto seed_entries = get_seed_entries( seed_inv );
2325
2326 int seed_index = query_seed( seed_entries );
2327
2328 // Did we cancel?
2329 if( seed_index < 0 || seed_index >= static_cast<int>( seed_entries.size() ) ) {
2330 add_msg( _( "You saved your seeds for later." ) );
2331 return;
2332 }
2333 const auto &seed_id = std::get<0>( seed_entries[seed_index] );
2334
2335 plant_seed( p, examp, seed_id );
2336}

Spawn spiders from a spider egg sack in radius 1 around the egg sack.

Transforms the egg sack furniture into a ruptured egg sack (f_egg_sacke). Also spawns eggs.

Parameters
pThe player
exampLocation of egg sack
montypeThe monster type of the created spiders.

2186 continue;

2192 int roll = rng( 4, 20 );
2193 bool drop_eggs = monster_count >= 1;

◆ elevator()

void iexamine::elevator ( player &  p,
const tripoint &  examp 
)

If underground, move 2 levels up else move 2 levels down.

Stable movement between levels 0 and -2.

Definition at line 882 of file iexamine.cpp.

883{
884 map &here = get_map();
885 if( !query_yn( _( "Use the %s?" ), here.tername( examp ) ) ) {
886 return;
887 }
888 int movez = ( examp.z < 0 ? 2 : -2 );
889
890 tripoint original_floor_omt = ms_to_omt_copy( here.getabs( examp ) );
891 tripoint new_floor_omt = original_floor_omt + tripoint( point_zero, movez );
892
893
894 // first find critters in the destination elevator and move them out of the way
895 for( Creature &critter : g->all_creatures() ) {
896 if( critter.is_player() ) {
897 continue;
898 } else if( here.has_flag( flag_ELEVATOR, critter.pos() ) ) {
899 tripoint critter_omt = ms_to_omt_copy( here.getabs( critter.pos() ) );
900 if( critter_omt == new_floor_omt ) {
901 for( const tripoint &candidate : closest_points_first( critter.pos(), 10 ) ) {
902 if( !here.has_flag( flag_ELEVATOR, candidate ) &&
903 here.passable( candidate ) &&
904 !g->critter_at( candidate ) ) {
905 critter.setpos( candidate );
906 break;
907 }
908 }
909 }
910 }
911 }
912
913 // TODO: do we have struct or pair to indicate from -> to?
914 const auto move_item = [&]( map_stack & items, const tripoint & src, const tripoint & dest ) {
915 for( auto it = items.begin(); it != items.end(); ) {
916 here.add_item_or_charges( dest, *it );
917 it = here.i_rem( src, it );
918 }
919 };
920
921 const auto first_elevator_tile = [&]( const tripoint & pos ) -> tripoint {
922 for( const tripoint &candidate : closest_points_first( pos, 10 ) )
923 {
924 if( here.has_flag( flag_ELEVATOR, candidate ) ) {
925 return candidate;
926 }
927 }
928 return pos;
929 };
930
931 // move along every item in the elevator
932 for( const tripoint &pos : closest_points_first( p.pos(), 10 ) ) {
933 if( here.has_flag( flag_ELEVATOR, pos ) ) {
934 map_stack items = here.i_at( pos );
935 tripoint dest = first_elevator_tile( pos + tripoint( 0, 0, movez ) );
936 move_item( items, pos, dest );
937 }
938 }
939
940 // move the player
941 g->vertical_move( movez, false );
942
943 // finally, bring along everyone who was in the elevator with the player
944 for( Creature &critter : g->all_creatures() ) {
945 if( critter.is_player() ) {
946 continue;
947 } else if( here.has_flag( flag_ELEVATOR, critter.pos() ) ) {
948 tripoint critter_omt = ms_to_omt_copy( here.getabs( critter.pos() ) );
949
950 if( critter_omt == original_floor_omt ) {
951 for( const tripoint &candidate : closest_points_first( p.pos(), 10 ) ) {
952 if( here.has_flag( flag_ELEVATOR, candidate ) &&
953 candidate != p.pos() &&
954 !g->critter_at( candidate ) ) {
955 critter.setpos( candidate );
956 break;
957 }
958 }
959 }
960 }
961 }
962}

2477{

2485
2486 // Reduce the amount of time it takes until the next stage of the plant by
2487 // 20% of a seasons length. (default 2.8 days).
2488 const time_duration fertilizerEpoch = calendar::season_length() * 0.2;
2489
2490 map &here = get_map();
2491 // Can't use item_stack::only_item() since there might be fertilizer
2492 map_stack items = here.i_at( tile );
2493 const map_stack::iterator seed = std::find_if( items.begin(), items.end(), []( const item & it ) {
2494 return it.is_seed();
2495 } );
2496 if( seed == items.end() ) {
2497 debugmsg( "Missing seed for plant at (%d, %d, %d)", tile.x, tile.y, tile.z );
2498 here.i_clear( tile );
2499 here.furn_set( tile, f_null );
2500 return;
2501 }
2502
2503 // TODO: item should probably clamp the value on its own
2504 seed->set_birthday( seed->birthday() - fertilizerEpoch );
2505 // The plant furniture has the NOITEM token which prevents adding items on that square,
2506 // spawned items are moved to an adjacent field instead, but the fertilizer token
2507 // must be on the square of the plant, therefore this hack:
2508 const auto old_furn = here.furn( tile );
2509 here.furn_set( tile, f_null );
2510 here.spawn_item( tile, itype_fertilizer, 1, 1, calendar::turn );
2511 here.furn_set( tile, old_furn );
2512 p.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 10_seconds ) );
2513
2514 //~ %1$s: plant name, %2$s: fertilizer name

2924 return it.has_flag( flag_FIRESTARTER ) || it.has_flag( flag_FIRE );

2926 const auto usef = it->type->get_use( "firestarter" );
2927 if( usef != nullptr && usef->get_actor_ptr() != nullptr ) {
2928 const auto actor = dynamic_cast<const firestarter_actor *>( usef->get_actor_ptr() );

2930 firestarters.insert( std::pair<int, item *>( actor->moves_cost_fast, it ) );

2932 }
2933 }
2934
2935 const bool has_firestarter = !firestarters.empty();

2940 selection_menu.text = _( "Select an action" );
2941 selection_menu.addentry( 0, true, 'g', _( "Get items" ) );
2942 if( !already_on_fire ) {
2943 selection_menu.addentry( 1, has_firestarter, 'f',
2944 has_firestarter ? _( "Start a fire" ) : _( "Start a fire you'll need a fire source." ) );
2945 if( has_bionic_firestarter ) {
2946 selection_menu.addentry( 2, true, 'b', _( "Use a CBM to start a fire" ) );
2947 }
2948 } else {
2949 selection_menu.addentry( 4, true, 'e', _( "Extinguish fire" ) );
2950 }

2953 }
2954 selection_menu.query();
2955
2956 switch( selection_menu.ret ) {
2957 case 0:
2958 none( p, examp );
2959 pickup::pick_up( examp, 0 );
2960 return;
2961 case 1: {
2962 for( auto &firestarter : firestarters ) {
2963 item *it = firestarter.second;
2964 const auto usef = it->type->get_use( "firestarter" );
2965 const auto actor = dynamic_cast<const firestarter_actor *>( usef->get_actor_ptr() );
2966 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You attempt to start a fire with your %s" ), it->tname() );
2967 const ret_val<bool> can_use = actor->can_use( p, *it, false, examp );
2968 if( can_use.success() ) {
2969 const int charges = actor->use( p, *it, false, examp );
2970 p.use_charges( it->typeId(), charges );
2971 return;
2972 } else {
2973 p.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, can_use.str() );
2974 }
2975 }
2976 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You weren't able to start a fire." ) );
2977 return;
2978 }
2979 case 2: {
2980 if( !here.get_field( examp, fd_fire ) && here.add_field( examp, fd_fire, 1 ) ) {
2981 p.mod_power_level( -bio_lighter->power_activate );
2982 p.mod_moves( -to_moves<int>( 1_seconds ) );
2983 } else {
2984 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You can't light a fire there." ) );
2985 }
2986 return;
2987 }
2988 case 3: {
2989 if( already_on_fire ) {
2990 if( !query_yn( _( "Really take down the %s while it's on fire?" ), here.furnname( examp ) ) ) {
2991 return;
2992 }
2993 }
2994 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You take down the %s." ),
2995 here.furnname( examp ) );
2996 const auto furn_item = here.furn( examp ).obj().deployed_item;
2997 here.add_item_or_charges( examp, item( furn_item, calendar::turn ) );
2998 here.furn_set( examp, f_null );
2999 return;
3000 }
3001 case 4: {
3002 here.remove_field( examp, fd_fire );
3003 p.mod_moves( -200 );
3004 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "With a few determined moves you put out the fire in the %s." ),
3005 here.furnname( examp ) );
3006 return;
3007 }
3008 default:
3009 none( p, examp );
3010 return;
3011 }
3012}

void iexamine::flower_poppy ( player &  p,
const tripoint &  examp 
)

Prompt pick (or drink nectar if able) poppy bud.

Not safe for player.

Drinking causes: -25 hunger, +20 fatigue, pkill2-70 effect and, 1 in 20 pkiller-1 addiction. Picking w/ env_resist < 5 causes 1 in 3 sleep for 12 min and 4 dmg to each leg

1913{
1914 if( dead_plant( true, p, examp ) ) {

1930 p.add_effect( effect_pkill2, 7_minutes );
1931 // Please drink poppy nectar responsibly.
1932 if( one_in( 20 ) ) {
1933 p.add_addiction( add_type::PKILLER, 1 );
1934 }

1940

1942
1943 if( resist < 10 ) {
1944 // Can't smell the flowers with a gas mask on!

1946 }
1947

1949
1950 // If it has been raining recently, then this event is twice less likely.
1951 if( ( ( recentWeather.rain_amount > 1 ) ? one_in( 6 ) : one_in( 3 ) ) && resist < 5 ) {
1952 // Should user player::infect, but can't!
1953 // player::infect needs to be restructured to return a bool indicating success.
1954 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You fall asleep" ) );

3015{
3016 itype_id brew_type;
3017 std::string brew_nname;
3018 bool to_deposit = false;
3019 static const auto vat_volume = units::from_liter( 50 );
3020 bool vat_full = false;
3021 bool ferment = false;
3022 bool brew_present = false;
3023 int charges_on_ground = 0;
3024 map &here = get_map();
3025 auto items = here.i_at( examp );
3026 for( auto item_it = items.begin(); item_it != items.end(); ) {
3027 if( !item_it->is_brewable() || brew_present ) {
3028 // This isn't a brew or there was already another kind of brew inside,
3029 // so this has to be moved.
3030 items.insert( *item_it );
3031 // This will add items to a space near the vat, because it's flagged as NOITEM.
3032 item_it = items.erase( item_it );
3033 } else {
3034 item_it++;
3035 brew_present = true;
3036 }
3037 }
3038 if( !brew_present ) {
3039 add_msg( _( "This keg is empty." ) );
3040 // TODO: Allow using brews from crafting inventory
3041 const auto b_inv = p.items_with( []( const item & it ) {
3042 return it.is_brewable();
3043 } );
3044 if( b_inv.empty() ) {
3045 add_msg( m_info, _( "You have no brew to ferment." ) );
3046 return;
3047 }
3048 // Make lists of unique typeids and names for the menu
3049 // Code shamelessly stolen from the crop planting function!
3050 std::vector<itype_id> b_types;
3051 std::vector<std::string> b_names;
3052 for( auto &b : b_inv ) {
3053 if( std::find( b_types.begin(), b_types.end(), b->typeId() ) == b_types.end() ) {
3054 b_types.push_back( b->typeId() );
3055 b_names.push_back( item::nname( b->typeId() ) );
3056 }
3057 }
3058 // Choose brew from list
3059 int b_index = 0;
3060 if( b_types.size() > 1 ) {
3061 b_index = uilist( _( "Use which brew?" ), b_names );
3062 } else { //Only one brew type was in inventory, so it's automatically used
3063 if( !query_yn( _( "Set %s in the vat?" ), b_names[0] ) ) {
3064 b_index = -1;
3065 }
3066 }
3067 if( b_index < 0 ) {
3068 return;
3069 }
3070 to_deposit = true;
3071 brew_type = b_types[b_index];
3072 brew_nname = item::nname( brew_type );
3073 } else {
3074 item &brew = here.i_at( examp ).only_item();
3075 brew_type = brew.typeId();
3076 brew_nname = item::nname( brew_type );
3077 charges_on_ground = brew.charges;
3078 add_msg( _( "This keg contains %s (%d), %0.f%% full." ),
3079 brew.tname(), brew.charges, brew.volume() * 100.0 / vat_volume );
3080 enum options { ADD_BREW, REMOVE_BREW, START_FERMENT };
3081 uilist selectmenu;
3082 selectmenu.text = _( "Select an action" );
3083 selectmenu.addentry( ADD_BREW, ( p.charges_of( brew_type ) > 0 ), MENU_AUTOASSIGN,
3084 _( "Add more %s to the vat" ), brew_nname );
3085 selectmenu.addentry( REMOVE_BREW, brew.made_of( LIQUID ), MENU_AUTOASSIGN,
3086 _( "Remove %s from the vat" ), brew.tname() );
3087 selectmenu.addentry( START_FERMENT, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Start fermenting cycle" ) );
3088 selectmenu.query();
3089 switch( selectmenu.ret ) {
3090 case ADD_BREW: {
3091 to_deposit = true;
3092 break;
3093 }
3094 case REMOVE_BREW: {
3095 liquid_handler::handle_liquid_from_ground( here.i_at( examp ).begin(), examp );
3096 return;
3097 }
3098 case START_FERMENT: {
3099 ferment = true;
3100 break;
3101 }
3102 default:
3103 add_msg( _( "Never mind." ) );
3104 return;
3105 }
3106 }
3107 if( to_deposit ) {
3108 item brew( brew_type, calendar::start_of_cataclysm );
3109 int charges_held = p.charges_of( brew_type );
3110 brew.charges = charges_on_ground;
3111 for( int i = 0; i < charges_held && !vat_full; i++ ) {
3112 p.use_charges( brew_type, 1 );
3113 brew.charges++;
3114 if( brew.volume() >= vat_volume ) {
3115 vat_full = true;
3116 }
3117 }
3118 add_msg( _( "Set %s in the vat." ), brew_nname );
3119 add_msg( _( "The keg now contains %s (%d), %0.f%% full." ),
3120 brew.tname(), brew.charges, brew.volume() * 100.0 / vat_volume );
3121 here.i_clear( examp );
3122 //This is needed to bypass NOITEM
3123 here.add_item( examp, brew );
3124 p.moves -= to_moves<int>( 20_seconds );
3125 if( !vat_full ) {
3126 ferment = query_yn( _( "Start fermenting cycle?" ) );
3127 }
3128 }
3129 if( vat_full || ferment ) {
3130 here.i_at( examp ).only_item().set_age( 0_turns );
3131 here.furn_set( examp, f_fvat_full );
3132 if( vat_full ) {
3133 add_msg( _( "The vat is full, so you close the lid and start the fermenting cycle." ) );
3134 } else {
3135 add_msg( _( "You close the lid and start the fermenting cycle." ) );
3136 }
3137 }
3138}

◆ fvat_full()

void iexamine::fvat_full ( player &  p,

3141{
3142 map &here = get_map();
3143 map_stack items_here = here.i_at( examp );
3144 if( items_here.empty() ) {
3145 debugmsg( "fvat_full was empty!" );
3146 here.furn_set( examp, f_fvat_empty );
3147 return;
3148 }
3149
3150 for( item &it : items_here ) {
3151 if( !it.made_of( LIQUID ) ) {
3152 add_msg( _( "You remove %s from the vat." ), it.tname() );
3153 here.add_item_or_charges( p.pos(), it );
3154 here.i_rem( examp, &it );
3155 }
3156 }
3157
3158 if( items_here.empty() ) {
3159 here.furn_set( examp, f_fvat_empty );
3160 return;
3161 }
3162
3163 item &brew_i = *items_here.begin();
3164 // Does the vat contain unfermented brew, or already fermented booze?
3165 // TODO: Allow "recursive brewing" to continue without player having to check on it
3166 if( brew_i.is_brewable() ) {
3167 add_msg( _( "There's a vat of %s set to ferment there." ), brew_i.tname() );
3168
3169 // TODO: change brew_time to return time_duration
3170 const time_duration brew_time = brew_i.brewing_time();
3171 const time_duration progress = brew_i.age();
3172 if( progress < brew_time ) {
3173 int hours = to_hours<int>( brew_time - progress );
3174 if( hours < 1 ) {
3175 add_msg( _( "It will finish brewing in less than an hour." ) );
3176 } else {
3177 add_msg( vgettext( "It will finish brewing in about %d hour.",
3178 "It will finish brewing in about %d hours.",
3179 hours ), hours );
3180 }
3181 return;
3182 }
3183
3184 if( query_yn( _( "Finish brewing?" ) ) ) {
3185 const auto results = brew_i.brewing_results();
3186
3187 here.i_clear( examp );
3188 for( const auto &result : results ) {
3189 // TODO: Different age based on settings
3190 item booze( result, brew_i.birthday(), brew_i.charges );
3191 here.add_item( examp, booze );
3192 if( booze.made_of( LIQUID ) ) {
3193 add_msg( _( "The %s is now ready for bottling." ), booze.tname() );
3194 }
3195 }
3196
3197 p.moves -= to_moves<int>( 5_seconds );
3198 p.practice( skill_cooking, std::min( to_minutes<int>( brew_time ) / 10, 100 ) );
3199 }
3200
3201 return;
3202 } else {
3203 add_msg( _( "There's a vat of fermented %s there." ), brew_i.tname() );
3204 }
3205
3206 const std::string booze_name = brew_i.tname();
3207 if( liquid_handler::handle_liquid_from_ground( items_here.begin(), examp ) ) {
3208 here.furn_set( examp, f_fvat_empty );
3209 add_msg( _( "You squeeze the last drops of %s from the vat." ), booze_name );
3210 }
3211}

void iexamine::gaspump ( player &  p,

Use "gas pump." Will pump any liquids on tile.

Dexterity decreases chance of spilling gas from a pump Dexterity decreases amount of gas spilled from a pump

Definition at line 355 of file iexamine.cpp.

356{
357 map &here = get_map();
358 if( !query_yn( _( "Use the %s?" ), here.tername( examp ) ) ) {
359 none( p, examp );
360 return;
361 }
362
363 auto items = here.i_at( examp );
364 for( auto item_it = items.begin(); item_it != items.end(); ++item_it ) {
365 if( item_it->made_of( LIQUID ) ) {
366 ///\EFFECT_DEX decreases chance of spilling gas from a pump
367 if( one_in( 10 + p.get_dex() ) ) {
368 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You accidentally spill the %s." ), item_it->type_name() );
369 static const auto max_spill_volume = units::from_liter( 1 );
370 const int max_spill_charges = std::max( 1, item_it->charges_per_volume( max_spill_volume ) );
371 ///\EFFECT_DEX decreases amount of gas spilled from a pump
372 const int qty = rng( 1, max_spill_charges * 8.0 / std::max( 1, p.get_dex() ) );
373
374 item spill = item_it->split( qty );
375 if( spill.is_null() ) {
376 here.add_item_or_charges( p.pos(), *item_it );
377 items.erase( item_it );
378 } else {
379 here.add_item_or_charges( p.pos(), spill );
380 }
381
382 } else {
383 liquid_handler::handle_liquid_from_ground( item_it, examp, 1 );
384 }
385 return;
386 }
387 }
388 add_msg( m_info, _( "Out of order." ) );
389}

◆ get_harvest_items()

std::list< item > iexamine::get_harvest_items ( const itype &  type,
int  plant_count,
int  seed_count,
bool  byproducts 
)

Items that appear when a generic plant is harvested.

Seed islot_seed.

Parameters
typeThe seed type, must have a itype::seed slot.
plant_countNumber of fruits to generate. For charge-based items, this specifies multiples of the default charge.
seed_countNumber of seeds to generate.
byproductsIf true, byproducts (like straw, withered plants, see islot_seed::byproducts) are included.

Definition at line 2347 of file iexamine.cpp.

2349{
2350 std::list<item> result;
2351 if( !type.seed ) {
2352 return result;
2353 }
2354 const islot_seed &seed_data = *type.seed;
2355 // This is a temporary measure, itype should instead provide appropriate accessors
2356 // to expose data about the seed item to allow harvesting to function.
2357 const itype_id &seed_type = type.get_id();
2358
2359 const auto add = [&]( const itype_id & id, const int count ) {
2360 item new_item( id, calendar::turn );
2361 if( new_item.count_by_charges() && count > 0 ) {
2362 new_item.charges *= count;
2363 new_item.charges /= seed_data.fruit_div;
2364 if( new_item.charges <= 0 ) {
2365 new_item.charges = 1;
2366 }
2367 result.push_back( new_item );
2368 } else if( count > 0 ) {
2369 result.insert( result.begin(), count, new_item );
2370 }
2371 };
2372
2373 if( seed_data.spawn_seeds ) {
2374 add( seed_type, seed_count );
2375 }
2376
2377 add( seed_data.fruit_id, plant_count );
2378
2379 if( byproducts ) {
2380 for( auto &b : seed_data.byproducts ) {
2381 add( b, 1 );
2382 }
2383 }
2384
2385 return result;
2386}

4258
4259 if( new_distance >= distance ) {
4260 continue;
4261 }

4263 // Return a potentially empty tank, but only if we don't find a closer full one.
4264 tank_loc.emplace( tmp );
4265 }

Actual harvesting of selected plant.

2399

2401 debugmsg( "Missing seed for plant at (%d, %d, %d)", examp.x, examp.y, examp.z );

2403 here.furn_set( examp, f_null );

2415 p.get_thirst() > thirst_levels::very_thirsty ) ) {

2422 g->place_critter_at( mon_fungal_blossom, examp );

2424 } else if( ( p.has_trait( trait_THRESH_MYCUS ) ) || one_in( 4 ) ) {

2426 add_msg( m_info, _( "The seed blossoms rather rapidly" ) );
2427 } else {

2429 add_msg( m_info, _( "The seed blossoms into a flower-looking fungus." ) );
2430 }
2431 } else { // Generic seed, use the seed item data
2432 const itype &type = *seed->type;
2433 here.i_clear( examp );
2434
2435 int skillLevel = p.get_skill_level( skill_survival );
2436 ///\EFFECT_SURVIVAL increases number of plants harvested from a seed
2437 int plant_count = rng( skillLevel / 2, skillLevel );
2438 plant_count *= here.furn( examp )->plant->harvest_multiplier;
2439 const int max_harvest_count = get_option<int>( "MAX_HARVEST_COUNT" );
2440 if( plant_count >= max_harvest_count ) {
2441 plant_count = max_harvest_count;
2442 } else if( plant_count <= 0 ) {
2443 plant_count = 1;
2444 }
2445 const int seedCount = std::max( 1, rng( plant_count / 4, plant_count / 2 ) );
2446 for( auto &i : get_harvest_items( type, plant_count, seedCount, true ) ) {
2447 if( from_activity ) {
2448 i.set_var( "activity_var", p.name );
2449 }
2450 here.add_item_or_charges( examp, i );
2451 }
2452 here.furn_set( examp, furn_str_id( here.furn( examp )->plant->transform ) );

3262 } );

3264 return it.made_of( LIQUID );
3265 } );
3266
3267 if( !liquid_present || has_container_with_liquid ) {
3268 add_msg( m_info, _( "It is empty." ) );
3269 // Get list of all drinks
3270 auto drinks_inv = p.items_with( []( const item & it ) {
3271 return it.made_of( LIQUID );
3272 } );
3273 if( drinks_inv.empty() ) {
3274 add_msg( m_info, _( "You don't have any drinks to fill the %s with." ), keg_name );
3275 return;
3276 }
3277 // Make lists of unique drinks... about third time we do this, maybe we ought to make a function next time
3278 std::vector<itype_id> drink_types;
3279 std::vector<std::string> drink_names;
3280 std::vector<double> drink_rot;
3281 for( auto &drink : drinks_inv ) {
3282 auto found_drink = std::find( drink_types.begin(), drink_types.end(), drink->typeId() );
3283 if( found_drink == drink_types.end() ) {
3284 drink_types.push_back( drink->typeId() );
3285 drink_names.push_back( item::nname( drink->typeId() ) );
3286 drink_rot.push_back( drink->get_relative_rot() );
3287 } else {
3288 auto rot_iter = std::next( drink_rot.begin(), std::distance( drink_types.begin(), found_drink ) );
3289 // Yep, worst rot wins.
3290 *rot_iter = std::max( *rot_iter, drink->get_relative_rot() );
3291 }
3292 }
3293 // Choose drink to store in keg from list
3294 int drink_index = 0;
3295 if( drink_types.size() > 1 ) {
3296 drink_index = uilist( _( "Store which drink?" ), drink_names );
3297 if( drink_index < 0 || static_cast<size_t>( drink_index ) >= drink_types.size() ) {
3298 drink_index = -1;
3299 }
3300 } else { //Only one drink type was in inventory, so it's automatically used
3301 if( !query_yn( _( "Fill the %1$s with %2$s?" ),
3302 keg_name, drink_names[0].c_str() ) ) {
3303 drink_index = -1;
3304 }
3305 }
3306 if( drink_index < 0 ) {
3307 return;
3308 }
3309
3310 // First empty the keg of foreign objects
3311 displace_items_except_one_liquid( examp );
3312
3313 //Store liquid chosen in the keg
3314 itype_id drink_type = drink_types[ drink_index ];

3316 item drink( drink_type, calendar::start_of_cataclysm );
3317 drink.set_relative_rot( drink_rot[ drink_index ] );

3319 bool keg_full = false;
3320 for( int i = 0; i < charges_held && !keg_full; i++ ) {
3321 g->u.use_charges( drink.typeId(), 1 );
3322 drink.charges++;
3323 keg_full = drink.volume() >= keg_cap;
3324 }
3325 if( keg_full ) {
3326 add_msg( _( "You completely fill the %1$s with %2$s." ),
3327 keg_name, item::nname( drink_type ) );
3328 } else {
3329 add_msg( _( "You fill the %1$s with %2$s." ),
3330 keg_name, item::nname( drink_type ) );

3334 here.add_item( examp, drink );
3335 return;
3336 } else {
3337 // First empty the keg of foreign objects

3345 DISPENSE,
3346 HAVE_A_DRINK,
3347 REFILL,
3348 EXAMINE,

3350 uilist selectmenu;

3352 _( "Dispense or dump %s" ), drink_tname );
3353 selectmenu.addentry( HAVE_A_DRINK, drink.is_food() && drink.made_of( LIQUID ),

3355 selectmenu.addentry( REFILL, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Refill" ) );
3356 selectmenu.addentry( EXAMINE, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Examine" ) );
3357
3358 selectmenu.text = _( "Select an action" );
3359 selectmenu.query();
3360
3361 switch( selectmenu.ret ) {
3362 case DISPENSE:
3363 if( liquid_handler::handle_liquid_from_ground( items.begin(), examp ) ) {
3364 add_msg( _( "You squeeze the last drops of %1$s from the %2$s." ),
3365 drink_tname, keg_name );
3366 }
3367 return;
3368
3369 case HAVE_A_DRINK:
3370 if( !p.eat( drink ) ) {
3371 return; // They didn't actually drink
3372 }
3373
3374 if( drink.charges == 0 ) {
3375 add_msg( _( "You squeeze the last drops of %1$s from the %2$s." ),
3376 drink_tname, keg_name );
3377 here.i_clear( examp );
3378 }
3379 p.moves -= to_moves<int>( 5_seconds );
3380 return;
3381
3382 case REFILL: {
3383 if( drink.volume() >= keg_cap ) {
3384 add_msg( _( "The %s is completely full." ), keg_name );
3385 return;
3386 }
3387 int charges_held = p.charges_of( drink.typeId() );
3388 if( charges_held < 1 ) {
3389 add_msg( m_info, _( "You don't have any %1$s to fill the %2$s with." ),
3390 drink_nname, keg_name );
3391 return;
3392 }
3393 item tmp( drink.typeId(), calendar::turn, charges_held );
3394 pour_into_keg( examp, tmp );
3395 p.use_charges( drink.typeId(), charges_held - tmp.charges );
3396 add_msg( _( "You fill the %1$s with %2$s." ), keg_name, drink_nname );
3397 p.moves -= to_moves<int>( 10_seconds );
3398 return;
3399 }
3400
3401 case EXAMINE: {
3402 add_msg( m_info, _( "It contains %s (%d), %0.f%% full." ),
3403 drink_tname, drink.charges, drink.volume() * 100.0 / keg_cap );
3404 return;
3405 }
3406
3407 default:
3408 return;
3409 }

2604 auto items = here.i_at( examp );
2605 for( const item &i : items ) {
2606 if( i.typeId() == itype_charcoal ) {
2607 add_msg( _( "This kiln already contains charcoal." ) );
2608 add_msg( _( "Remove it before firing the kiln again." ) );
2609 return;
2610 } else if( i.made_of_any( kilnable ) ) {
2611 fuel_present = true;
2612 } else {

2614 false ) );
2615 return;
2616 }

2621 return;

2623
2624 ///\EFFECT_FABRICATION decreases loss when firing a kiln
2625 const int skill = p.get_skill_level( skill_fabrication );
2626 int loss = 60 - 2 *
2627 skill; // We can afford to be inefficient - logs and skeletons are cheap, charcoal isn't
2628
2629 // Burn stuff that should get charred, leave out the rest
2630 units::volume total_volume = 0_ml;
2631 for( const item &i : items ) {
2632 total_volume += i.volume();
2633 }
2634
2635 units::volume char_volume = ( 100 - loss ) * total_volume / 100;
2636 int char_charges = itype_unfinished_charcoal->charges_per_volume( char_volume );

2638 add_msg( _( "The batch in this kiln is too small to yield any charcoal." ) );
2639 return;
2640 }
2641
2642 if( !p.has_charges( itype_fire, 1 ) ) {
2643 add_msg( _( "This kiln is ready to be fired, but you have no fire source." ) );
2644 return;
2645 } else {
2646 add_msg( _( "This kiln contains %s %s of material, and is ready to be fired." ),

2658 here.add_item( examp, result );

4634 } else if( here.ter( dest ).obj().trap == tr_ledge ) {
4635 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You are not going to jump over an obstacle only to fall down." ) );
4636 } else {

4638 p.setpos( dest );
4639 }
4640 break;
4641 }
4642 case 2: {

4644 tripoint below = examp;
4645 below.z--;

4648 below.z--;
4649 }

4654 return;

4661 "Looks like %d stories. Jump down?",
4662 height );
4663
4664 if( height > 1 && !query_yn( query_str.c_str(), height ) ) {
4665 return;
4666 } else if( height == 1 ) {
4667 std::string query;
4668
4669 if( !has_grapnel ) {
4670 if( climb_cost <= 0 && fall_mod > 0.8 ) {
4671 query = _( "You probably won't be able to get up and jumping down may hurt. Jump?" );
4672 } else if( climb_cost <= 0 ) {
4673 query = _( "You probably won't be able to get back up. Climb down?" );
4674 } else if( climb_cost < 200 ) {
4675 query = _( "You should be able to climb back up easily if you climb down there. Climb down?" );
4676 } else {
4677 query = _( "You may have problems climbing back up. Climb down?" );
4678 }
4679 } else {

4681 }

4683 if( !query_yn( query.c_str() ) ) {
4684 return;
4685 }
4686 }
4687
4688 p.moves -= to_moves<int>( 1_seconds + 1_seconds * fall_mod );
4689 p.setpos( examp );
4690
4691 if( has_grapnel ) {
4692 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You tie the rope around your waist and begin to climb down." ) );
4693 }
4694
4695 if( climb_cost > 0 || rng_float( 0.8, 1.0 ) > fall_mod ) {
4696 // One tile of falling less (possibly zero)
4697 g->vertical_move( -1, true );
4698 }
4699 here.creature_on_trap( p );
4700 break;
4701 }
4702 case 3: {
4703
4704 if( !can_use_mutation_warn( trait_WEB_BRDIGE, p ) ) {
4705 break;
4706 }
4707 const int range = 6; //this means we could web across a gap of 5.
4708 int success_range = 0;
4709 bool success = false;
4710 for( int i = 2; i <= range; i++ ) {
4711 //break at the first non empty space encountered
4712 if( g->m.ter( tripoint( p.posx() + i * sgn( examp.x - p.posx() ),
4713 p.posy() + i * sgn( examp.y - p.posy() ), p.posz() ) ) != t_open_air ) {
4714 success_range = i;
4715 success = true;
4716 break;
4717 }
4718 }
4719 if( !success ) {
4720 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "There is nothing for your to attach your web to!" ) );
4721 } else {
4722 for( int i = 1; i < success_range; i++ ) {
4723 tripoint dest( p.posx() + i * sgn( examp.x - p.posx() ), p.posy() + i * sgn( examp.y - p.posy() ),
4724 p.posz() );
4725
4726 g->m.ter_set( dest, t_web_bridge );
4727 }
4728 p.mutation_spend_resources( trait_WEB_BRDIGE );
4729 }
4730 break;
4731 }
4732 default:
4733 popup( _( "You decided to step back from the ledge." ) );
4734 break;
4735 }

5493 result.components.push_back( it );

5497 result.set_flag( f );

5504 result.unset_flag( flag_PROCESSING_RESULT );

4449
4450 int pumpCount = getNearPumpCount( examp );

4453 return;
4454 }
4455
4456 int tankGasUnits;

4461 }
4462 const tripoint pTank = *pTank_;
4463
4464 if( tankGasUnits == 0 ) {
4465 popup( str_to_illiterate_str(
4466 _( "This station is out of fuel. We apologize for the inconvenience." ) ) );
4467 return;
4468 }
4469
4470 if( uistate.ags_pay_gas_selected_pump + 1 > pumpCount ) {
4471 uistate.ags_pay_gas_selected_pump = 0;
4472 }
4473
4474 int discount = findBestGasDiscount( p );
4475 std::string discountName = getGasDiscountName( discount );
4476
4477 int pricePerUnit = getGasPricePerLiter( discount );
4478
4479 bool can_hack = ( !p.has_trait( trait_ILLITERATE ) &&
4480 ( ( p.has_charges( itype_electrohack, 25 ) ) ||
4481 ( p.has_bionic( bio_fingerhack ) && p.get_power_level() > 24_kJ ) ) );
4482
4483 uilist amenu;
4484 amenu.selected = 1;
4485 amenu.text = str_to_illiterate_str( _( "Welcome to AutoGas!" ) );
4486 amenu.addentry( 0, false, -1, str_to_illiterate_str( _( "What would you like to do?" ) ) );
4487
4488 amenu.addentry( buy_gas, true, 'b', str_to_illiterate_str( _( "Buy gas." ) ) );
4489 amenu.addentry( refund, true, 'r', str_to_illiterate_str( _( "Refund cash." ) ) );
4490

4492 std::to_string( uistate.ags_pay_gas_selected_pump + 1 );

4494 amenu.addentry( choose_pump, true, 'p', str_to_illiterate_str( _( "Choose a gas pump." ) ) );
4495

4497 amenu.addentry( 0, false, -1, str_to_illiterate_str( _( "Your price per gasoline unit: " ) ) +
4498 format_money( pricePerUnit ) );
4499
4500 if( can_hack ) {
4501 amenu.addentry( hack, true, 'h', _( "Hack console." ) );
4502 }
4503
4504 amenu.query();
4505 choice = amenu.ret;
4506
4507 if( choose_pump == choice ) {
4508 uilist amenu;
4509 amenu.selected = uistate.ags_pay_gas_selected_pump;
4510 amenu.text = str_to_illiterate_str( _( "Please choose gas pump:" ) );
4511
4512 for( int i = 0; i < pumpCount; i++ ) {
4513 amenu.addentry( i, true, -1,
4514 str_to_illiterate_str( _( "Pump " ) ) + std::to_string( i + 1 ) );
4515 }
4516 amenu.query();
4517 choice = amenu.ret;
4518
4519 if( choice < 0 ) {
4520 return;
4521 }
4522
4523 uistate.ags_pay_gas_selected_pump = choice;
4524
4525 turnOnSelectedPump( examp, uistate.ags_pay_gas_selected_pump );
4526
4527 return;
4528
4529 }
4530
4531 if( buy_gas == choice ) {
4532 int money = p.charges_of( itype_cash_card );
4533
4534 if( money < pricePerUnit ) {
4535 popup( str_to_illiterate_str(
4536 _( "Not enough money, please refill your cash card." ) ) ); //or ride on a solar car, ha ha ha
4537 return;
4538 }
4539
4540 int maximum_liters = std::min( money / pricePerUnit, tankGasUnits / 1000 );
4541
4542 std::string popupmsg = string_format(
4543 _( "How many liters of gasoline to buy? Max: %d L. (0 to cancel)" ), maximum_liters );
4544 int liters = string_input_popup()
4545 .title( popupmsg )
4546 .width( 20 )
4547 .text( std::to_string( maximum_liters ) )
4548 .only_digits( true )
4549 .query_int();
4550 if( liters <= 0 ) {
4551 return;
4552 }
4553 if( liters > maximum_liters ) {
4554 liters = maximum_liters;
4555 }
4556
4557 const cata::optional<tripoint> pGasPump = getGasPumpByNumber( examp,
4558 uistate.ags_pay_gas_selected_pump );

4560 return;
4561 }
4562
4563 sounds::sound( p.pos(), 6, sounds::sound_t::activity, _( "Glug Glug Glug" ), true, "tool",
4564 "gaspump" );
4565
4566 int cost = liters * pricePerUnit;
4567 money -= cost;
4568 p.use_charges( itype_cash_card, cost );
4569
4570 add_msg( m_info, _( "Your cash cards now hold %s." ), format_money( money ) );
4571 p.moves -= to_moves<int>( 5_seconds );
4572 return;
4573 }
4574
4575 if( hack == choice ) {
4576 try_start_hacking( p, examp );
4577 }
4578
4579 if( refund == choice ) {
4580 const int pos = p.inv.position_by_type( itype_id( "cash_card" ) );
4581
4582 if( pos == INT_MIN ) {
4583 add_msg( _( "Never mind." ) );
4584 return;
4585 }
4586
4587 item *cashcard = &( p.i_at( pos ) );
4588 // Okay, we have a cash card. Now we need to know what's left in the pump.
4589 const cata::optional<tripoint> pGasPump = getGasPumpByNumber( examp,
4590 uistate.ags_pay_gas_selected_pump );
4591 int amount = pGasPump ? fromPumpFuel( pTank, *pGasPump ) : 0;
4592 if( amount >= 0 ) {
4593 sounds::sound( p.pos(), 6, sounds::sound_t::activity, _( "Glug Glug Glug" ), true, "tool",
4594 "gaspump" );
4595 cashcard->charges += amount * pricePerUnit / 1000.0f;
4596 add_msg( m_info, _( "Your cash cards now hold %s." ),
4597 format_money( p.charges_of( itype_cash_card ) ) );
4598 p.moves -= to_moves<int>( 5_seconds );
4599 return;
4600 } else {
4601 popup( _( "Unable to refund, no fuel in pump." ) );
4602 return;
4603 }
4604 }

◆ pour_into_keg()

bool iexamine::pour_into_keg ( const tripoint &  pos,
item &  liquid 
)

Pour liquid into a keg (furniture) on the map.

The transferred charges (if any) will be removed from the liquid item.

Returns
Whether any charges have been transferred at all.

Definition at line 3418 of file iexamine.cpp.

3419{
3420 const units::volume keg_cap = get_keg_capacity( pos );
3421 if( keg_cap <= 0_ml ) {
3422 return false;
3423 }
3424 map &here = get_map();
3425 const auto keg_name = here.name( pos );
3426
3427 map_stack stack = here.i_at( pos );
3428 if( stack.empty() ) {
3429 here.add_item( pos, liquid );
3430 here.i_at( pos ).only_item().charges = 0; // Will be set later
3431 } else if( stack.only_item().typeId() != liquid.typeId() ) {
3432 add_msg( _( "The %s already contains some %s, you can't add a different liquid to it." ),
3433 keg_name, item::nname( stack.only_item().typeId() ) );
3434 return false;
3435 }
3436
3437 item &drink = stack.only_item();
3438 if( drink.volume() >= keg_cap ) {
3439 add_msg( _( "The %s is full." ), keg_name );
3440 return false;
3441 }
3442
3443 add_msg( _( "You pour %1$s into the %2$s." ), liquid.tname(), keg_name );
3444 while( liquid.charges > 0 && drink.volume() < keg_cap ) {
3445 drink.charges++;
3446 liquid.charges--;
3447 }
3448 return true;
3449}

6368{
6369 ///\EFFECT_INT Intelligence caps survival skill gains from foraging
6370 const int max_forage_skill = p->int_cur / 3 + 1;
6371 ///\EFFECT_SURVIVAL decreases survival skill gain from foraging (NEGATIVE)
6372 const int max_exp = 2 * ( max_forage_skill - p->get_skill_level( skill_survival ) );

5793{
5794 map &here = get_map();
5795 if( here.furn( examp ) == furn_str_id( "f_water_mill" ) ) {
5796 if( !here.is_water_shallow_current( examp ) ) {
5797 add_msg( _( "The water mill needs to be over shallow flowing water to work." ) );
5798 return;
5799 }
5800 }
5801 if( here.furn( examp ) == furn_str_id( "f_wind_mill" ) ) {
5802 if( g->is_sheltered( examp ) ) {
5803 add_msg( _( "The wind mill needs to be outside in the wind to work." ) );
5804 return;
5805 }
5806 }
5807
5808 const bool active = here.furn( examp ) == furn_str_id( "f_water_mill_active" ) ||
5809 here.furn( examp ) == furn_str_id( "f_wind_mill_active" );
5810 map_stack items_here = here.i_at( examp );
5811
5812 if( items_here.empty() && active ) {
5813 debugmsg( "active mill was empty!" );
5814 if( here.furn( examp ) == furn_str_id( "f_water_mill_active" ) ) {
5815 here.furn_set( examp, f_water_mill );
5816 } else if( here.furn( examp ) == furn_str_id( "f_wind_mill_active" ) ) {
5817 here.furn_set( examp, f_wind_mill );
5818 }
5819 return;
5820 }
5821
5822 if( items_here.size() == 1 && items_here.begin()->typeId() == itype_fake_milling_item ) {
5823 debugmsg( "f_mill_active was empty, and had fake_milling_item!" );
5824 if( here.furn( examp ) == furn_str_id( "f_water_mill_active" ) ) {
5825 here.furn_set( examp, f_water_mill );
5826 } else if( here.furn( examp ) == furn_str_id( "f_wind_mill_active" ) ) {
5827 here.furn_set( examp, f_wind_mill );
5828 }
5829 items_here.erase( items_here.begin() );
5830 return;
5831 }
5832
5833 time_duration time_left = 0_turns;
5834 units::volume f_volume = 0_ml;
5835 bool f_check = false;
5836
5837 for( const item &it : items_here ) {
5838 if( it.typeId() != itype_fake_milling_item ) {
5839 f_check = true;
5840 f_volume += it.volume();
5841 }
5842 if( active && it.typeId() == itype_fake_milling_item ) {
5843 time_left = time_duration::from_turns( it.item_counter );
5844 }
5845 }
5846
5847 const bool empty = f_volume == 0_ml;
5848 const bool full = f_volume >= sm_rack::MAX_FOOD_VOLUME;
5849 const auto remaining_capacity = sm_rack::MAX_FOOD_VOLUME - f_volume;
5850
5851 uilist smenu;
5852 smenu.text = _( "What to do with the mill?" );
5853 smenu.desc_enabled = true;
5854
5855 smenu.addentry( 0, true, 'i', _( "Inspect mill" ) );
5856
5857 if( !active ) {
5858 smenu.addentry_desc( 1, !empty, 'r',
5859 empty ? _( "Remove brake and start milling insert some products for milling first" ) :
5860 _( "Remove brake and start milling" ),
5861 string_format( _( "Remove brake and start milling, milling will take about %s." ),
5862 to_string( milling_time ) ) );
5863
5864 smenu.addentry_desc( 2, !full, 'p',
5865 full ? _( "Insert products for milling mill is full" ) :
5866 string_format( _( "Insert products for milling remaining capacity is %s %s" ),
5867 format_volume( remaining_capacity ), volume_units_abbr() ),
5868 _( "Fill the mill with starchy products such as wheat, barley or oats." ) );
5869
5870 if( f_check ) {
5871 smenu.addentry( 3, f_check, 'e', _( "Remove products from mill" ) );
5872 }
5873
5874 } else {
5875 smenu.addentry_desc( 4, true, 'x',
5876 _( "Apply brake to mill" ),
5877 _( "Applying the brake will stop milling process." ) );
5878 }
5879
5880 smenu.query();
5881
5882 switch( smenu.ret ) {
5883 case 0: { //inspect mill
5884 std::string pop;
5885 if( active ) {
5886 pop = colorize( _( "There's a mill here. It is turning and milling." ), c_green ) + "\n";
5887 if( time_left > 0_turns ) {
5888 pop += string_format( _( "It should take about %s to finish milling." ),
5889 to_string_clipped( time_left ) ) + "\n";
5890 }
5891 } else {
5892 pop += colorize( _( "There's a mill here." ), c_green ) + "\n";
5893 }
5894 pop += colorize( _( "You inspect its contents and find: " ), c_green ) + "\n\n";
5895 if( items_here.empty() ) {
5896 pop += _( "that it is empty." );
5897 } else {
5898 std::map<item, int> mill_list;
5899 for( const item &it : items_here ) {
5900 if( it.typeId() == itype_fake_milling_item ) {
5901 pop += "\n" + colorize( _( "You see that the milling process is not yet complete." ),
5902 c_red ) + "\n";
5903 continue;
5904 }
5905 mill_list[it] += it.count();
5906 }
5907 for( auto it_mill : mill_list ) {
5908 pop += "-> " + item::nname( it_mill.first.typeId(),
5909 it_mill.first.count() ) + ( ( it_mill.second > 1 ) ? " (" + std::to_string(
5910 it_mill.second ) + ")\n" : "\n" );
5911 }
5912 }
5913 popup( pop, PF_NONE );
5914 break;
5915 }
5916 case 1:
5917 //activate
5918 if( active ) {
5919 add_msg( _( "It is already milling." ) );
5920 } else {
5921 mill_activate( p, examp );
5922 }
5923 break;
5924 case 2:
5925 // load food
5926 mill_load_food( p, examp, remaining_capacity );
5927 break;
5928 case 3:
5929 // remove food
5930 for( map_stack::iterator it = items_here.begin(); it != items_here.end(); ) {
5931 if( it->typeId() != itype_fake_milling_item ) {
5932 // get handling cost before the item reference is invalidated
5933 const int handling_cost = -p.item_handling_cost( *it );
5934
5935 add_msg( _( "You remove %s from the mill." ), it->tname() );
5936 here.add_item_or_charges( p.pos(), *it );
5937 it = items_here.erase( it );
5938 p.mod_moves( handling_cost );
5939 } else {
5940 ++it;
5941 }
5942 }
5943 if( active ) {
5944 if( here.furn( examp ) == furn_str_id( "f_water_mill_active" ) ) {
5945 here.furn_set( examp, f_water_mill );
5946 } else if( here.furn( examp ) == furn_str_id( "f_wind_mill_active" ) ) {
5947 here.furn_set( examp, f_wind_mill );
5948 }
5949 add_msg( m_info, _( "You stop the milling process." ) );
5950 }
5951 break;
5952 default:
5953 add_msg( m_info, _( "Never mind." ) );
5954 break;
5955 case 4:
5956 if( here.furn( examp ) == furn_str_id( "f_water_mill_active" ) ) {
5957 here.furn_set( examp, f_water_mill );
5958 } else if( here.furn( examp ) == furn_str_id( "f_wind_mill_active" ) ) {
5959 here.furn_set( examp, f_wind_mill );
5960 }
5961 add_msg( m_info, _( "You stop the milling process." ) );
5962 break;
5963 }
5964}

3706{
3707 // choose what metal to recycle
3708 auto metals = materials::get_compactable();
3709 uilist choose_metal;
3710 choose_metal.text = _( "Recycle what metal?" );
3711 for( auto &m : metals ) {
3712 choose_metal.addentry( m.name() );
3713 }
3714 choose_metal.query();
3715 int m_idx = choose_metal.ret;
3716 if( m_idx < 0 || m_idx >= static_cast<int>( metals.size() ) ) {
3717 add_msg( _( "Never mind." ) );
3718 return;
3719 }
3720 material_type m = metals.at( m_idx );
3721
3722 map &here = get_map();
3723 // check inputs and tally total mass
3724 auto inputs = here.i_at( examp );
3725 units::mass sum_weight = 0_gram;
3726 auto ca = m.compact_accepts();
3727 std::set<material_id> accepts( ca.begin(), ca.end() );
3728 accepts.insert( m.id );
3729 for( auto &input : inputs ) {
3730 if( !input.only_made_of( accepts ) ) {
3731 //~ %1$s: an item in the compactor , %2$s: desired compactor output material
3732 add_msg( _( "You realize this isn't going to work because %1$s is not made purely of %2$s." ),
3733 input.tname(), m.name() );
3734 return;
3735 }
3736 if( input.is_container() && !input.is_container_empty() ) {
3737 //~ %1$s: an item in the compactor
3738 add_msg( _( "You realize this isn't going to work because %1$s has not been emptied of its contents." ),
3739 input.tname() );
3740 return;
3741 }
3742 sum_weight += input.weight();
3743 }
3744 if( sum_weight <= 0_gram ) {
3745 //~ %1$s: desired compactor output material
3746 add_msg( _( "There is no %1$s in the compactor. Drop some metal items onto it and try again." ),
3747 m.name() );
3748 return;
3749 }
3750
3751 // See below for recover_factor (rng(6,9)/10), this
3752 // is the normal value of that recover factor.
3753 static const double norm_recover_factor = 8.0 / 10.0;
3754 const units::mass norm_recover_weight = sum_weight * norm_recover_factor;
3755
3756 // choose output
3757 uilist choose_output;
3758 //~ %1$.3f: total mass of material in compactor, %2$s: weight units , %3$s: compactor output material
3759 choose_output.text = string_format( _( "Compact %1$.3f %2$s of %3$s into:" ),
3760 convert_weight( sum_weight ), weight_units(), m.name() );
3761 for( auto &ci : m.compacts_into() ) {
3762 auto it = item( ci, calendar::start_of_cataclysm, item::solitary_tag{} );
3763 const int amount = norm_recover_weight / it.weight();
3764 //~ %1$d: number of, %2$s: output item
3765 choose_output.addentry( string_format( _( "about %1$d %2$s" ), amount,
3766 it.tname( amount ) ) );
3767 }
3768 choose_output.query();
3769 int o_idx = choose_output.ret;
3770 if( o_idx < 0 || o_idx >= static_cast<int>( m.compacts_into().size() ) ) {
3771 add_msg( _( "Never mind." ) );
3772 return;
3773 }
3774
3775 // remove items
3776 for( auto it = inputs.begin(); it != inputs.end(); ) {
3777 it = inputs.erase( it );
3778 }
3779
3780 // produce outputs
3781 double recover_factor = rng( 6, 9 ) / 10.0;
3782 sum_weight = sum_weight * recover_factor;
3783 sounds::sound( examp, 80, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( "Ka-klunk!" ), true, "tool", "compactor" );
3784 bool out_desired = false;
3785 bool out_any = false;
3786 for( auto it = m.compacts_into().begin() + o_idx; it != m.compacts_into().end(); ++it ) {
3787 const units::mass ow = item( *it, calendar::start_of_cataclysm, item::solitary_tag{} ).weight();
3788 int count = sum_weight / ow;
3789 sum_weight -= count * ow;
3790 if( count > 0 ) {
3791 here.spawn_item( examp, *it, count, 1, calendar::turn );
3792 if( !out_any ) {
3793 out_any = true;
3794 if( it == m.compacts_into().begin() + o_idx ) {
3795 out_desired = true;
3796 }
3797 }
3798 }
3799 }
3800
3801 // feedback to user
3802 if( !out_any ) {
3803 add_msg( _( "The compactor chews up all the items in its hopper." ) );
3804 //~ %1$s: compactor output material
3805 add_msg( _( "The compactor beeps: \"No %1$s to process!\"" ), m.name() );
3806 return;
3807 }
3808 if( !out_desired ) {
3809 //~ %1$s: compactor output material
3810 add_msg( _( "The compactor beeps: \"Insufficient %1$s!\"" ), m.name() );
3811 add_msg( _( "It spits out an assortment of smaller pieces instead." ) );
3812 }

◆ safe()

void iexamine::safe ( player &  p,
const tripoint &  examp 
)

Attempt to crack safe through audio-feedback manual lock manipulation.

Try to unlock the safe by moving the dial and listening for the mechanism to "click into place." Time per attempt affected by perception and mechanics. 30 minutes per attempt minimum. Small chance of just guessing the combo without listening device.

Perception speeds up safe cracking Mechanics speeds up safe cracking

Definition at line 1417 of file iexamine.cpp.

1418{
1419 auto cracking_tool = p.crafting_inventory().items_with( []( const item & it ) -> bool {
1420 item temporary_item( it.type );
1421 return temporary_item.has_flag( flag_SAFECRACK );
1422 } );
1423
1424 if( !( !cracking_tool.empty() || p.has_bionic( bio_ears ) ) ) {
1425 p.moves -= to_turns<int>( 10_seconds );
1426 // one_in(30^3) chance of guessing
1427 if( one_in( 27000 ) ) {
1428 p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You mess with the dial for a little bit and it opens!" ) );
1429 get_map().furn_set( examp, f_safe_o );
1430 return;
1431 } else {
1432 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You mess with the dial for a little bit." ) );
1433 return;
1434 }
1435 }
1436
1437 if( p.is_deaf() ) {
1438 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't crack a safe while deaf!" ) );
1439 return;
1440 } else if( p.has_effect( effect_earphones ) ) {
1441 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't crack a safe while listening to music!" ) );
1442 return;
1443 } else if( query_yn( _( "Attempt to crack the safe?" ) ) ) {
1444 add_msg( m_info, _( "You start cracking the safe." ) );
1445 // 150 minutes +/- 20 minutes per mechanics point away from 3 +/- 10 minutes per
1446 // perception point away from 8; capped at 30 minutes minimum. *100 to convert to moves
1447 ///\EFFECT_PER speeds up safe cracking
1448
1449 ///\EFFECT_MECHANICS speeds up safe cracking
1450 const time_duration time = std::max( 150_minutes - 20_minutes * ( p.get_skill_level(
1451 skill_mechanics ) - 3 ) - 10_minutes * ( p.get_per() - 8 ), 30_minutes );
1452
1453 p.assign_activity( ACT_CRACKING, to_moves<int>( time ) );
1454 p.activity.placement = examp;
1455 }

void iexamine::slot_machine ( player &  p,

Loop prompt to bet $10.

Definition at line 1372 of file iexamine.cpp.

1373{
1374 const int price = 10;
1375 auto cents = []( int x ) {
1376 return x * 100;
1377 };
1378 bool played = false;
1379 while( true ) {
1380 if( p.cash < cents( price ) ) {
1381 add_msg( m_info, _( "You need $%d to play." ), price );
1382 break;
1383 }
1384 if( !query_yn( played ? _( "Play again for $%d?" ) : _( "Insert $%d?" ), price ) ) {
1385 break;
1386 }
1387 p.cash -= cents( price );
1388 played = true;
1389 int won;
1390 if( one_in( 5 ) ) {
1391 won = price;
1392 popup( _( "Three cherries you get your money back!" ) );
1393 } else if( one_in( 20 ) ) {
1394 won = 50;
1395 popup( _( "Three bells you win $%d!" ), won );
1396 } else if( one_in( 50 ) ) {
1397 won = 200;
1398 popup( _( "Three stars you win $%d!" ), won );
1399 } else if( one_in( 1000 ) ) {
1400 won = 3000;
1401 popup( _( "JACKPOT! You win $%d!" ), won );
1402 } else {
1403 won = 0;
1404 popup( _( "No win." ) );
1405 }
1406 p.cash += cents( won );
1407 }
1408}

void iexamine::transform ( player &  p,

)

Transform the examined object into the object specified by its transforms_into property.

If the new object has a message property, it is displayed as if the notify examine_action was used.

3820 return;
3821 }

3824 if( tr.loadid == tr_unfinished_construction || here.partial_con_at( examp ) ) {
3825 partial_con *pc = here.partial_con_at( examp );
3826 if( pc ) {
3827 if( !character_funcs::can_see_fine_details( p ) && !p.has_trait( trait_DEBUG_HS ) ) {
3828 add_msg( m_info, _( "It is too dark to construct right now." ) );
3829 return;
3830 }
3831 const construction &built = pc->id.obj();
3832 if( !query_yn( _( "Unfinished task: %s, %d%% complete here, continue construction?" ),
3833 built.group->name(), pc->counter / 100000 ) ) {
3834 if( query_yn( _( "Cancel construction?" ) ) ) {
3835 here.disarm_trap( examp );
3836 for( const item &it : pc->components ) {
3837 here.add_item_or_charges( p.pos(), it );
3838 }
3839 here.partial_con_remove( examp );
3840 return;
3841 } else {
3842 return;
3843 }
3844 } else {
3845 p.assign_activity( ACT_BUILD );
3846 p.activity.placement = here.getabs( examp );
3847 return;
3848 }
3849 } else {
3850 return;
3851 }
3852 }
3853 if( seen && possible >= 99 ) {
3854 add_msg( m_info, _( "That %s looks too dangerous to mess with. Best leave it alone." ),
3855 tr.name() );
3856 return;
3857 }
3858 // Some traps are not actual traps. Those should get a different query.
3859 if( seen && possible == 0 &&
3860 tr.get_avoidance() == 0 ) { // Separated so saying no doesn't trigger the other query.
3861 if( query_yn( _( "There is a %s there. Take down?" ), tr.name() ) ) {
3862 here.disarm_trap( examp );
3863 }
3864 } else if( seen && query_yn( _( "There is a %s there. Disarm?" ), tr.name() ) ) {
3865 here.disarm_trap( examp );
3866 }

4034 return;
4035 }
4036 const furn_t &furniture = m.furn( examp ).obj();
4037 const std::vector<itype> item_type_list = furniture.crafting_pseudo_item_types();

4039 std::vector<std::string> usable_item_names;
4040 if( item_type_list.empty() ) {
4041 debugmsg(
4042 "Furniture ( %s ) with use_furn_fake_item does not have fake item to use.",
4043 furniture.id.c_str()
4044 );
4045 return;
4046 }
4047 for( const itype &itt : item_type_list ) {
4048 if( !itt.has_use() ) {
4049 continue;
4050 }
4051 usable_item_types.push_back( itt );
4052 usable_item_names.push_back( itt.nname( 1 ) );
4053 }
4054 if( usable_item_types.empty() ) {
4055 debugmsg(
4056 "Furniture ( %s ) with use_furn_fake_item has no fake item with uses",
4057 furniture.id.c_str() );
4058 return;
4059 }
4060
4061 int tool_index = 0;
4062 if( usable_item_types.size() > 1 ) {
4063 tool_index = uilist( _( "Which tool do you want to use?" ), usable_item_names );
4064 if( tool_index < 0 || static_cast<size_t>( tool_index ) >= usable_item_types.size() ) {
4065 tool_index = -1;
4066 }
4067 }
4068 if( tool_index < 0 ) {
4069 return;
4070 }
4071
4072 const itype &cur_tool = usable_item_types.at( tool_index );
4073 item fake_item( cur_tool.get_id(), calendar::turn, 0 );
4074 const itype_id ammo = fake_item.ammo_default();

4076
4077 enum class charges_type {
4078 grid, ammo_from_map, none
4079 };
4080
4081 charges_type charge_type = charges_type::none;
4082 fake_item.charges = 0;
4083
4084 if( fake_item.has_flag( "USES_GRID_POWER" ) ) {
4085 const distribution_grid &grid = get_distribution_grid_tracker().grid_at( abspos );
4086 fake_item.charges = grid.get_resource();
4087 charge_type = charges_type::grid;
4088 } else if( ammo != itype_id::NULL_ID() ) {
4089 fake_item.charges = count_charges_in_list( &*ammo, m.i_at( examp ) );
4090 charge_type = charges_type::ammo_from_map;
4091 }
4092
4093 const int original_charges = fake_item.charges;
4094 p.invoke_item( &fake_item );
4095
4096 // HACK: Evil hack incoming
4097 activity_handlers::repair_activity_hack::patch_activity_for_furniture( g->u.activity, examp,
4098 cur_tool.get_id() );
4099
4100 const int discharged_ammo = original_charges - fake_item.charges;
4101
4102 if( discharged_ammo == 0 ) {
4103 return;
4104 }
4105
4106 switch( charge_type ) {
4107 case charges_type::grid: {
4108 distribution_grid &grid = get_distribution_grid_tracker().grid_at( abspos );
4109 const int remainder = grid.mod_resource( -discharged_ammo );
4110 if( remainder != 0 ) {
4111 debugmsg( "Fake item %s discharged more charges than have in grid at %s.",
4112 cur_tool.get_id().c_str(), abspos.to_string() );
4113 }
4114 return;
4115 }
4116 case charges_type::ammo_from_map: {
4117 int by_ref = discharged_ammo;
4118 m.use_charges( examp, 0, ammo->get_id(), by_ref );
4119 if( by_ref != 0 ) {
4120 debugmsg( "Discharged fake item %s more ammo than %s has at %s.",
4121 cur_tool.get_id().c_str(),
4122 furniture.id.c_str(),
4123 examp.to_string()
4124 );
4125 }
4126 return;
4127 }
4128 case charges_type::none:
4129 debugmsg( "Somehow changed charges of fake item %s without ammo type to %d.",
4130 cur_tool.get_id().c_str(),
4131 fake_item.charges
4132 );
4133 return;
4134 }

)

Generates vending machine UI and allows players to purchase contained items with a cash card.

Definition at line 674 of file iexamine.cpp.

675{
676 constexpr int moves_cost = to_turns<int>( 5_seconds );
677 int money = p.charges_of( itype_cash_card );
678 auto vend_items = get_map().i_at( examp );
679
680 if( vend_items.empty() ) {
681 add_msg( m_info, _( "The vending machine is empty." ) );
682 return;
683 }
684
685 if( !money ) {
686 popup( _( "You need some money on a cash card to buy things." ) );
687 }
688
689 int w_items_w = 0;
690 int w_info_w = 0;
691 int list_lines = 0;
692 int lines_above = 0;
693 int lines_below = 0;
694 constexpr int first_item_offset = 3; // header size
695
696 catacurses::window w;
697 catacurses::window w_item_info;
698
699 ui_adaptor ui;
700 ui.on_screen_resize( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
701 const point padding( std::max( 0, TERMX - FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH ) / 4, std::max( 0,
702 TERMY - FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT ) / 6 );
703 const int window_h = FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT + std::max( 0, TERMY - FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT ) * 2 / 3;
704 const int window_w = FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH + std::max( 0, TERMX - FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH ) / 2;
705 w_items_w = window_w / 2;
706 w_info_w = window_w - w_items_w;
707 list_lines = window_h - 4; // minus for header and footer
708
709 lines_above = list_lines / 2; // lines above the selector
710 lines_below = list_lines / 2 + list_lines % 2; // lines below the selector
711
712 w = catacurses::newwin( window_h, w_items_w,
713 padding );
714 w_item_info = catacurses::newwin( window_h, w_info_w,
715 padding + point( w_items_w, 0 ) );
716
717 ui.position( padding, point( window_w, window_h ) );
718 } );
719 ui.mark_resize();
720
721 bool used_machine = false;
722 input_context ctxt( "VENDING_MACHINE" );
723 ctxt.register_updown();
724 ctxt.register_action( "CONFIRM" );
725 ctxt.register_action( "QUIT" );
726 ctxt.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
727
728 // Collate identical items.
729 // First, build a map {item::tname} => {item_it, item_it, item_it...}
730 using iterator_t = decltype( std::begin( vend_items ) ); // map_stack::iterator doesn't exist.
731
732 std::map<std::string, std::vector<iterator_t>> item_map;
733 for( auto it = std::begin( vend_items ); it != std::end( vend_items ); ++it ) {
734 // |# {name}|
735 // 123 4
736 item_map[it->tname()].push_back( it );
737 }
738
739 // Next, put pointers to the pairs in the map in a vector to allow indexing.
740 std::vector<std::map<std::string, std::vector<iterator_t>>::value_type *> item_list;
741 item_list.reserve( item_map.size() );
742 for( auto &pair : item_map ) {
743 item_list.emplace_back( &pair );
744 }
745
746 int cur_pos = 0;
747 ui.on_redraw( [&]( const ui_adaptor & ) {
748 const int num_items = item_list.size();
749 const int page_size = std::min( num_items, list_lines );
750
751 werase( w );
752 wborder( w, LINE_XOXO, LINE_XOXO, LINE_OXOX, LINE_OXOX,
753 LINE_OXXO, LINE_OOXX, LINE_XXOO, LINE_XOOX );
754 mvwhline( w, point( 1, first_item_offset - 1 ), LINE_OXOX, w_items_w - 2 );
755 mvwaddch( w, point( 0, first_item_offset - 1 ), LINE_XXXO ); // |-
756 mvwaddch( w, point( w_items_w - 1, first_item_offset - 1 ), LINE_XOXX ); // -|
757
758 trim_and_print( w, point( 2, 1 ), w_items_w - 3, c_light_gray,
759 _( "Money left: %s" ), format_money( money ) );
760
761 // Keep the item selector centered in the page.
762 int page_beg;
763 if( cur_pos < num_items - cur_pos ) {
764 page_beg = std::max( 0, cur_pos - lines_above );
765 } else {
766 int page_end = std::min( num_items, cur_pos + lines_below );
767 page_beg = std::max( 0, page_end - list_lines );
768 }
769
770 for( int line = 0; line < page_size; ++line ) {
771 const int i = page_beg + line;
772 const auto color = ( i == cur_pos ) ? h_light_gray : c_light_gray;
773 const auto &elem = item_list[i];
774 const int count = elem->second.size();
775 const char c = ( count < 10 ) ? ( '0' + count ) : '*';
776 trim_and_print( w, point( 1, first_item_offset + line ), w_items_w - 3, color, "%c %s", c,
777 elem->first.c_str() );
778 }
779
780 draw_scrollbar( w, cur_pos, list_lines, num_items, point( 0, first_item_offset ) );
781 wnoutrefresh( w );
782
783 // Item info
784 auto &cur_items = item_list[static_cast<size_t>( cur_pos )]->second;
785 auto &cur_item = cur_items.back();
786
787 werase( w_item_info );
788 // | {line}|
789 // 12 3
790 fold_and_print( w_item_info, point( 2, 1 ), w_info_w - 3, c_light_gray, cur_item->info_string() );
791 wborder( w_item_info, LINE_XOXO, LINE_XOXO, LINE_OXOX, LINE_OXOX,
792 LINE_OXXO, LINE_OOXX, LINE_XXOO, LINE_XOOX );
793
794 //+<{name}>+
795 //12 34
796 const std::string name = utf8_truncate( cur_item->display_name(),
797 static_cast<size_t>( w_info_w - 4 ) );
798 mvwprintw( w_item_info, point_east, "<%s>", name );
799 wnoutrefresh( w_item_info );
800 } );
801
802 for( ;; ) {
803 ui_manager::redraw();
804
805 const int num_items = item_list.size();
806
807 // Item info
808 auto &cur_items = item_list[static_cast<size_t>( cur_pos )]->second;
809 auto &cur_item = cur_items.back();
810
811 const std::string &action = ctxt.handle_input();
812 if( action == "DOWN" ) {
813 cur_pos = ( cur_pos + 1 ) % num_items;
814 } else if( action == "UP" ) {
815 cur_pos = ( cur_pos + num_items - 1 ) % num_items;
816 } else if( action == "CONFIRM" ) {
817 const int iprice = cur_item->price( false );
818
819 if( iprice > money ) {
820 popup( _( "You can't afford that item." ) );
821 continue;
822 }
823
824 if( !used_machine ) {
825 used_machine = true;
826 p.moves -= moves_cost;
827 }
828
829 money -= iprice;
830 p.use_charges( itype_cash_card, iprice );
831 p.i_add_or_drop( *cur_item );
832
833 vend_items.erase( cur_item );
834 cur_items.pop_back();
835 if( !cur_items.empty() ) {
836 continue;
837 }
838
839 item_list.erase( std::begin( item_list ) + cur_pos );
840 if( item_list.empty() ) {
841 add_msg( _( "With a beep, the empty vending machine shuts down." ) );
842 return;
843 } else if( cur_pos == num_items - 1 ) {
844 cur_pos--;
845 }
846 } else if( action == "QUIT" ) {
847 break;
848 }
849 }
850}
